title: Learning Object-Based Set Covering Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (sets, functions, equations)
context.additional_context: A mathematics education course that integrates real-time interaction and project-based assessment in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners derive connections between mathematical concepts using set-covering models by analyzing learning object attributes
Select and apply alternative learning resources using similarity measurement techniques
Design an optimal learning object combination under given constraints and apply it to a mathematical problem-solving project

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
